amendment.description: Amendment permits participation of dual enrollment programs in demonstration projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to permit participation of dual enrollment programs in demonstration projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gowdy amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 0 (Roll no. 439).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gowdy amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 0 (Roll no. 439).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Gowdy.
